content:encoded:
This week on Case Closed, we begin with The Sneak Assassin, from Barrie Craig, Confidential Investigator. That story aired November 21, 1954.

(30:08) The Enigma Of Big Ed, the April 4, 1952, episode of Richard Diamond, Private Investigator is our final episode this week.

Download CaseClosed734

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you’d like to help out, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
